errors.error_description: In the PyPI installation section, the command `pip install numpy scipy` is listed before `pip install pyclarity`. These are common dependencies and will be installed automatically by pip when installing `pyclarity`, making this step redundant and potentially causing version conflicts.
correction_candidates: Remove the line `pip install numpy scipy`.
Change `pip install numpy scipy` to `pip install --upgrade numpy scipy`.
Move the `pip install numpy scipy` line to after `pip install pyclarity`.
Change `pip install numpy scipy` to `conda install numpy scipy`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the line `pip install numpy scipy`.
